tooltip.enderthing.colorMissing: The color depends on the wools used, but can be changed later.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_key_chest.right: Craft an Ender Lock and Shift-rightclick on a vanilla chest.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_key.rightClick: Shift-Rightclick on a vanilla ender chest to open the shared inventory.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_lock.rightClick: Shift-Rightclick on a ender chest to set or replace the color key.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_pack.rightClick: Rightclick to open the shared inventory.
tooltip.enderthing.ender_card.rightClick: Shift-Rightclick on air to bind it to you.
Shift-Rightclick on a private chest to bind the chest and allow automation.
text.enderthing.ender_card.bound: The card is now bound to you
text.enderthing.ender_chest.bound1: The chest is now bound to: %s
